title: Migrate ticker skill to ticks
description:

- ticker/skills/ticker/SKILL.md → ticks/skills/ticks/SKILL.md
- ticker/skills/ticker/references/tk-commands.md → ticks/skills/ticks/references/tk-commands.md
- ticker/skills/ticker/references/tick-patterns.md → ticks/skills/ticks/references/tick-patterns.md

**Updates required:**

3. Monitoring:

4. Log cleanup:

5. references/tk-commands.md:

   - Add gc command
   - Add board command

6. General:
